title: OOL teams for s8?
body:
Looking to join an OOL team as ADC 
Rank of the team doesnt matter as long as its a team that commits to schedule and consistently plays/scrims.

replies.body:
I'm not on a team but I'm also looking for a team for S8

Want to try make a team seeing there is still some time
I like to keep on schedule.

If your interested in what i proposed just message me on League
Name is MyzticKnife
